dialogs.npcText: Hello my child, you have completed your trial. You have completed your right of passage and may now join us in celebration.
Go, enjoy the party. You have earned it.
Ah yes, you cant remember anything before today right? That should change soon. Those drugs we gave you should work out of your system soon.
To complete your right of passage, and join us as a member of the community, you completed tasks showing your ability to help those around you.
Yes, the drugs wiped your memory of all of us and our language so we could judge your strength of character. Everybody has gone through it before.
Yes, you passed with flying colors.
